question.text:
Select one word to describe the following statements and choose the correct option.

a. If F1 resembled either of the two parents
b. If F1 resembled both the parents
c. If F1 did not resemble either of the two parents and was in between the two

solution.text: If member of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></math> generation resembles phenotypically with any parent (dominant parent) then this phenomenon is said to be Dominance. If member of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></math> generation carries characters of both the parents then this phenomenon is said to be Co-dominance. If member of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></math> generation is not resembled with any parent rather an intermediate phenotype is visible then this phenomenon is said to be Incomplete Dominance.
